website_summaries.verdict: Although this model falls on the lower end of the price range for its class, the performance and cooling capabilities make it a solid value for consumers with small to medium spaces to cool.
pros: Capable of cooling up to 450 sq
Digital controls are easy to use and give it a streamlined appearance
cons: Exhaust hose and kit components are flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Will not honor warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Honeywell will not honor the one year parts and labor warranty. Exactly what other reviews stated. Stop working after two months of use.
customer_reviews.author: S. DJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy set up, evaporator avoid water bucket
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Really like this unit. Low noise and basic to operate. Cools well. I like the evaporator feature to avoid a emptying a water bucket or running a drain hose across the room or out the window. The Install is way easier than hanging one of those window units and I can direct the flow by moving the unit around. I also like that it's portable enough to take to my folks cabin on weekends.
customer_reviews.author: HP Disappoints

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a solution to help stabilize air temp. between our upper and lower levels. Having the portable A/C unit for the upper level in the summer and utilizing the heat function during winter in our lower level. So far, the A/C function has worked great in the upper level to stabilize. May use the de-humidifier function downstairs in the summer as well as it's easy to move the unit and fits nicely out of the way. Full function intuitive control panel requires no directions. Highly recommend. Easy set up from shipping box to plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Mace Pfutzenreuter

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Marriage
customer_reviews.text: Needed this in an emergency because our central air system broke down during a heat wave and could not get repaired for 2 weeks because of the lack of parts. This unit was a life saver and worked very well. I followed the instructions exactly and had no problems with this unit. It cooled our one bedroom condo very nicely and it did not consume a lot of electricity in doing so. As far as using this as a temporary solution, it was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Walt O.

customer_reviews.title: Died on the second day of use.
customer_reviews.text: On the second day of use, it started to smell like burnt electronics and I was forced to return it in the middle of a heat wave. Definitely do not recommend for sliding windows. The vent was designed for a hung window and so it requires a little creativity to get it to work correctly for sliding windows.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 0 stars I would. This unit advertises that the recommended room size that it is designed for is 450 square foot. This thing was put into a room with the square footage of about 120 square feet and couldn't cool the room below 76 deg on an 89 deg day. A regular 3 year old 8000 btu window unit in another room (same size room) cooled the room to a temp of 66 deg. I would not recommend this product. I had read that the portable units were not as good as the window units but this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Taman72

customer_reviews.title: Cools off fast
customer_reviews.text: This portable A/C can cool off most good sized rooms with the help of an oscillating fan. We use it on a 14x16' living room. I think it has other features too like dehumidifier. Fat chance on getting a hose for that drainage for the dehumidifier feature, that needs to be purchased separately. What I like about this A/C unit is a pissed off teen could figure out how to put it together. It's quick and easy to use with the use of any window that slides open. It won't work with french door windows.
customer_reviews.author: crys

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness.
customer_reviews.text: The remote only works within eight feet of the unit but that's ok. The unit is upstairs in our old 1925 house where there's only one duct for both the AC and heat for the entire upstairs. It's just too hot up there without extra cooling. This is perfect. I thought based on the projected square footage it was designed to cool that we would have to move it to the room being used and seal off the others but it's actually cooling two rooms and a hallway if we leave the doors open. It's the first time we've been able to enjoy being upstairs during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Only for rooms up to 350 Sq. Ft. NOT 450 Sq. Ft. as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The description states “450 Sq. Ft.” but when the box arrived to my home I returned immediately because the box says it only covers up to 350 Sq. Ft. Change the title description and save people their time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great air conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one in 2016 because where I live doesn’t have air conditioning. When I moved into a bigger space, I ordered a second one. They have lasted and are great! My first one started clicking recently and I contacted them. They were so nice and sent me a replacement. I highly recommend this air conditioning. It’s quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Holiday Cheer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to cool my 3 car garage when I am out there ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cool my 3 car garage when I am out there working during the summer. It works great on days when temp is below 90. As my garage isn't insulated, it drops the temp just enough to make it comfortable, but not cool. But if I feel a little overheated, I just go stand in front of the nice, cool air for a minute and it cools me right off. Wish I would have had one of these years ago when I lived in 400 sf apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Never worked, Honeywell Customer Support is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I received a product that didn't work, it never blew cold air. After months of trying to contact Honeywell for help and receiving extremely rude, curt responses, I finally gave up and begged Amazon for a refund. Thank goodness for Amazon! I will never buy another Honeywell product. I don't mind that occasionally things don't work, I do mind being treated rudely.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Duncan

customer_reviews.title: and it keeps me cool and sane
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for cooling (it does that really well), 1 star for volume - it's obnoxiously loud and I find it hard to sleep with it on. I wear earplugs though, and it keeps me cool and sane. Wish they made more silent portables though. I have it installed in a right to left sliding window, which is great - I can't put a window AC in that type of window. It would be a bit of a hassle to move room to room, but it fits nicely where it is now and cools my bedroom off in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have a capecod with my office upstairs. In the summer its miserable up there. I got this at the beginning of summer and it's been amazing, it keeps the upstairs a normal temp and I haven't had any issues with it so far. Also haven't noticed any huge increase in utilities bill. The one thing I will say is it was heavy so you definitely want help getting it upstairs, I did it by myself but I shouldn't have, I almost didnt make it..lol
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brought the temp down 10 degrees in one day
customer_reviews.text: We panicked during an unusual heat wave and bought this portable A/C unit. It brought the temp on our second story down from about 85 to 75 degrees in one day. Even though we only needed it for about two weeks and then the temps returned to normal, it was worth the money to not be miserable in our own house. Long term I don't know how it will do, and I'm a little anxious about that after reading other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Well that was disappointing. After arriving a day after schedule it did arrive. There was a great film all over t. Got it installed turned it on and it felt like it worked great. The room was not getting cooler but standing in front of it felt nice and co. The fan in the back wasn’t working. So had to return it. Was hoping for a replacement but nope.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Greaser

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement portable AC unit
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an LG unit which no longer cools. Must be a coolant or compressor problem. Repairs would have cost more than buying the new unit. This unit performs even better than the LG, is quieter, and has improved control options. The carport attached room being cooled is used for canned and dry goods food storage.
customer_reviews.author: Orkiwi

customer_reviews.title: Do Not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my bedroom and it immediately would not work, compressor would turn on then just shut off and the fan would go on never cooling the room. I returned/exchanged it and it worked for about one week, while it was not too hot. As soon as it got above 80 degrees in the bedroom the compressor would turn on then immediately switch to the fan and NOT cool the room. The customer service at the company itself was terrible, I had to wait at least 15 min before someone answered the phone, and no trouble shooting, just told me to return it through Amazon. So disappointing!! FYI Amazon customer was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would like to hear back from customer service
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job when it turns on. However, it shuts off every thirty minutes to be emptied. Why is it accumulating with so much water so fast? It's pointless to have an air conditioner that requires you to empty the water every thirty minutes. Maybe mine is broken, would like to hear back from customer service...
customer_reviews.author: C.Smith

customer_reviews.title: The Sun Room Isn't a Hot Box Anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a home with a beautiful sun room and discovered that it was only habitable until about 10:30 on summer mornings. After that the heat and humidity became unbearable even with all the windows open. This portable unit drops the temperature and the humidity, which means the room is wonderful all day. What I didn't realize when I bought it is that it's also a heat pump - in the winter it will warm the space. Makes me aaaalllllmost look forward to winter. :D
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and does not last.
customer_reviews.text: After a year the motor worked itself out of true causing it to hum loudly only getting worse over time. Not worth the money for just one season of use effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey pratz

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a small unit to cool down the master bedroom versus cooling the whole house
customer_reviews.text: Quiet compared to other portable AC. We have central air in the house. Wanted a small unit to cool down the master bedroom versus cooling the whole house. This AC does the job. It is fairly quite. Since it is in close proximity to our bed...we place pillows around the unit to dampen excess noise. We are able to sleep with the unit running. The fan has two speeds...You cannot expect perfection....but this AC works efficiently and about as quite as a portable unit inside your room can get.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Covered in Oil
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the box and removed the air conditioner, we discovered oil all over the machine, but especially on the bottom of the box. There was so much oil that it stained our floors. My understanding is that the oil is from the compressor. We are returning the product rather than keep a machine that is oily on the outside but likely lacks the proper lubricant on the inside given that SO much oil leaked out. Why did I still give this product 3 stars? This is the second time we've purchased this model. We are still happy with the unit we purchased in 2017, but we find the condition of this unit (purchased in 2020) to be unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Look for at a different company unreliable products
customer_reviews.text: This air conditioner was great...while it lasted. I purchased this in 2014 and since then have had 2 replacement units sent to me by Honeywell since the compressor failed on all three that I had. Now since the third unit failed they just fully refunded my money I spent in 2014...which is nice, but I would rather just have a AC unit that didnt break every other year during the hottest time of the season too.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A Good Air Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and works very well in my one-bedroom apartment. It's not as noisy as a window air conditioner and I like the fact that I can use it as a fan, dehumidifier or heater, too. I'm glad I bought this machine. It gets hot up on the second floor and it has made it much more comfortable this summer.
customer_reviews.author: barbs13

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these items. One was missing the connectors. I contacted the manufacturer to see if they would assist, but they refused because "it wasn't purchased from Sylvane". It also took over a week to get a response that they would not help me (I had to email a second time). With Amazon the only other option would be to replace the whole unit, which I thought was wasteful. Will not buy a product from Sylvane/Honeywell again. Beyond disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Try another one
customer_reviews.text: The hose is ridiculously short! And it does NOT fit correctly in a standard size window. I have to prop it up on a table for the hose to reach the window but the casters don’t lock so that is not going to work. I will be returning - not taking a chance on this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Will not even cool a 12 x 12 room
customer_reviews.text: This barely lasted two years. Seriously. It looks like they have redesigned it. But I’m out the money for the first time around. Not what I would call a reliable product
customer_reviews.author: Eliana Selzer

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to set up and the wheels make it heaven for us to use and move. Heavy unit - glad it is on wheels. It is a little loud for what we were looking for, but it does keep us cool in this heat we are experiencing. So glad we purchased this unit.
customer_reviews.author: noni66

customer_reviews.title: Worked nicely
customer_reviews.text: We got this for the upstairs bedroom that was always hot in the summertime. it worked great and allowed us to turn the central air in the entire home up a little warmer so we no longer had to run it so hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy to be COOL
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Wednesday -arrived Friday in perfect condition! The easy-to-open box had picture instructions on the top. Unit is fully assembled except for hot-air exhaust assembly which took me about 5 minutes to put together. I would recommend watching the video provided on line to see where and how to place in room. THE UNIT IS up and running right now with lots of COLD air coming out. Quality product! The remote control only works right in front of unit so far but I may have missed something.
customer_reviews.author: Janice A.

customer_reviews.title: It's more of a fan that has a slight chill than an AC
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is fine in the sense that it does blow cool air but even on high, it is very noisy and doesn't really cool down the room which is 340 sq ft. We put it through a stress test on high and it didn't do much except lower the house by 2 degrees. Can't say I'm extremely satisfied for the price, but I'm too lazy to return it and already got rid of the box, so I guess jokes on me. Luckily summer is mostly over anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: There are much better units out there for the same price that won't arrive broken and will have several install options. This one was extremely disappointing and I had to try it twice since parts arrived broken... both times.
customer_reviews.author: EnterTheHero

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t function as AC.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit hoping it would be my salvation from a 90 degree house but it does nothing a box fan can’t manage actually, the box fan does better. I even switched rooms to the smallest one I have (150 sq ft) and it still cannot cool it. No cold air can be felt coming from the unit despite messing with all of the settings and ensuring everything was as directed. I’m a very broke person and took a big gamble in search for relief only to find I am still very broke and still a very sweaty person. Save your money and find a different unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Reece

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Cool!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing can’t even cool my room that’s 140 square feet, please do not buy this is totally not worth it and yes I set it up properly and my door is closed and had it in the setting at 61 degrees PS: when I took the picture the so called air conditioner was running for 1 hour and it’s 80 degrees outside with the max fan speed too.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Great unit.
customer_reviews.text: Very cold air from this unit which is the most important thing. The intake noise level is not louder then other portable units. There is no motor or vibration sound. It should be placed across the room for best all around results. Very happy with this purchase. Ordered second unit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael3

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for portability, solid design, good air flow, easy setup and quiet operation
customer_reviews.text: Simple to unpack and setup. Literally 5 minutes. Twist a couple hoses together, slide the assembly in the window, connect to AC unit, plug in, set temperature and enjoy the cool. One portion of my home is always hot and my central air just doesn't seem to do the job for that side of the house despite good upkeep. I also wanted it to help circulate fresher air. I love the design because it is very easy to clean, not a lot of cracks and crevices to worry about. Good air flow, immediate and obvious cooling. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Not great.
customer_reviews.text: 3.5 stars. Shipping box was damaged but no big deal, ac was fine. Did not have the layer of oil others are complaining about. Entering third year of ownership, have it cooling our master 20x20 bedroom. It does ok, there are better and worse but this is a solid 3.5, mildly noisy but not intolerable. Seems to do a good job in cooling a 100 degree room to 70 in a few hours, but we’re in Colorado so it doesn’t have to battle humidity. Those of you in humidor clients may need more time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this unit for 2 months now and I have to say I am quite happy with it. White it is not whisper quite it is not any louder than the $250 window unit I used to have at my prior apartment. No complaint so far.
customer_reviews.author: SK90211

customer_reviews.title: ... started generator- our family room [15' x 27' stayed cool for the next 4 days and nights until power ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pending hurricane IRMA- when the power went out took this out of box- started generator- our family room [15' x 27' stayed cool for the next 4 days and nights until power came back on. Room is 15' x 27', I set at 61 degrees- kept room at 73. Had make shift plastic barrier wall. This did everything I wanted it to do..Quite, easy to set up..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Its good. Just know that it needs the tube piece to to attached to the window for the AC unit to blow out hot air. It looks ugly. But i guess that's all AC units. It works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has been a great help.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after living in this house and hating my living room every summer.Lots of windows , but installed to slide from side to side. Finally got this unit when my husband was hospitalized and expected home in a very frail state. It has been a great help..works well , minimal water to drain , even in a solid week of 90 degree weather , we have been able to comfortably sit in easy chairs and watch TV in this room. Not enough noise to make TV need to be super loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cool ... pun intended
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I now own two of these and I may even get a third. Does a great job of dropping the temp. No need to empty water or anything and I think the noise is almost soothing. Not very loud at all. The only trouble I have is rigging it up to the sliding window. The attachment included isn't tall enough, so I just duct tape a piece of cardboard (from the many many amazon boxes that pile up beside the recycling bin!! ... too bad there is no Amazon packing pickup service...) to the top of the attachment and tape all around the edges. Works like a charm. Gotta love duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent AC air conditioner, 90%quieter than my other AC,inexpensive,
customer_reviews.text: Buying more of this AC unit&replacing my LOUD UNITS. It's relatively quiet. I love the vent on top&how inexpensive it was. I bought other brands more expensive in window&portable modes which are so loud. I love this one the best so far. I live rural NH no central AC like in Michigan. Highly RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Toula Milios Guilfoyle

customer_reviews.title: This sucks!
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived defective, (would not produce cold air) and I am having a hell of a time getting through to Amazon to handle this matter. I'm wanting to return the unit and get a replacement fast.. I need to get a job done. I've been waiting 3 days to get a reply, as I think their return method on the computer is also defective. It freezes up. I'm hoping I can talk to a human soon because my customer is getting pissed. Amazon's return site seems to freeze-up.
customer_reviews.author: george weisel

customer_reviews.title: It does help cool down the room fast but the problem is the ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this air conditioner to use in our master bedroom. It does help cool down the room fast but the problem is the noise. It is extremely loud when is on air conditioner mood. we ended up using the fan mode at nights since It makes less noise when its on fan mode. After two weeks of using the air conditioner we decided to get a traditional ceiling fan and moved the air conditioner to the basement. I am very disappointed because many reviews stated that the unit is very quit and doesn't make much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Nahid

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product from Amazon. The unit is defective. It leaks water when in the heating mode. Also, Amazon's Piolot Freight Services picked the unit up from my home to return to Amazon on September 29, 2020. I have yet to see my refund. In addition, when I finally do receive my refund, Amazon refuses to refund the full amount of $577.00, even though the unit doesn't work properly. The reason given is that they are charging me a restocking fee. The unit leaks water! The tank is cracked! How can something which is defective be restocked?! I repeat, do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping Comfortably!
customer_reviews.text: Cools our bedroom down perfectly in the summer time. My wife & I don't care for for full house AC only at night for sleeping comfort as we feel central AC would have us indoors more instead of enjoying the outdoors! Our Bedroom is a pretty large sized bedroom with a King bed and 4 dressers and a double wide vanity dresser with a his & her walk in closet and this unit will freeze you out if you wish. I have no doubts it would cool any other room the same!
customer_reviews.author: Tech Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May 2017 to use as an adjunct to central air to cool a 14X20 bedroom with cathedral ceilings at night and couldn’t be happier with it. I just pulled it out and turned it on last night for the start of the third summer and it’s still working just fine. I do empty the water from both plugs every day or two. Might not have to, but feel like it’s better for the machine. I’ve looked at other brands that were more expensive and a friend had an LG model the just died after the first year.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth T

customer_reviews.title: Cools well, relatively quiet and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for a portable unit. Relatively quiet but obviously not as quiet as central AC, however, not so loud that you won’t be able to sleep in the same room. We use it to cool a master suite about 450 square feet. It handles the job well. Easy to install - 15 minutes and we were done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adapter plate was missing
customer_reviews.text: We chose this item because of the fresh air adapter plate (see picture) and when it arrived it was not included . So I either got the incorrect item OR it was missing a part. The impenetrable chat email or phone resources of both Amazon and Honeywell were robot driven so the menu didn't include "a part was missing" or "verify I got the correct item" so the robot bounced me out and I was left with one resource.....to give an unfavorable review. update the issue was resolved when I called in this morning, they are sending a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Peter in Austin

customer_reviews.title: too loud to have a conversation
customer_reviews.text: Although this product cools your room/space down quickly, the noice level of the air conditioner is too loud. Even when it is just on circulating fan mode it is too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Island Nurse

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This AC has saved me from our heat wave. It cools the room pretty quickly and is not as noisy as a window model. It still has some noise, but you get used to it. My only complaint is the window attachment. The hose/panel connection needs some re-engineering as the clamps that hold the hose in, are flimsy and easily fall out. It would be nice if the panel with the hole was the very smallest piece and they you could add to fit your needs vs having to cut the pvc material. Nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I live in SoCal 2 blocks from the beach, where air conditioning in theory is unnecessary. When I saw one more heatwave headed our way, that was the last straw. I bought it for the bedroom which is approximately 200 square feet, cools the room to nearly frigid temps. Today I moved it to the living room which is approximately 600 square feet and it worked nearly as well. Before next summer I will buy one more for the living room, although probably 12,000 or 14,000 btu's.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work, extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as Honeywell makes good products,, but this did not work at all. We bought this to use in a fully insulated enclosed trailer, thats only 120 sq ft, and this could not keep it cool. We left running and it would blow cold air for an hour and switch to only be a fan. No one messed with the settings or anything, it would just stop blowing cold air. There was no comfort when using this and was honestly a waste of money. I would suggest not buying this if you are planning to cool anything larger than a linen closet...
customer_reviews.author: khullings

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it promises
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. I keep it in the SW corner in my Florida microwave...er house. It's changed how I live since I work at home, preferably in the living room near the SW corner. I plan to get another with a heat element to turn my enclosed porch from 1 season to a 3-season room.
customer_reviews.author: musiquest

customer_reviews.title: Works great, quieter than window ac unit
customer_reviews.text: This has made summer bearable. I was worried when I read other reviews saying its loud, but I have no complaints. Quieter than my apartment's wall ac unit, cools my bedroom quick and I find the white noise it makes acceptable. I'm a light sleeper, and it has never disturbed me. The window attachments that were included fit perfectly in my sliding window, I just bought a sliding window lock to make sure it stays in place. The 10,000 BTU unit is the perfect size for my 12x14 bedroom and attached bath.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and install
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and install. Works exactly as advertised. We bought it for use in our upstairs master bedroom. The room never cools properly in hot weather. You could have hung meat when I checked it after it was on for about three hours, had to cut back the temp. I'd mistakenly believed the weatherman when he said the humidity and temps would fall yesterday, instead it was 91 and high humidity. Turned the Central Air back on, placed this unit in the room, coolest it's ever been in these conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Kulaponeke

customer_reviews.title: Works well, put exhaust hose up fireplace flu!
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been working great. I placed it on front of my fireplace and ran the exhaust up the flu. I closed off the space left in the opening of the fireplace glass doors with blankets and draped a big blanket over the whole thing. Works great since I didn't have a top opening window! Cools down my living room well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rubingh

customer_reviews.title: Cold Air in Texas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I live in Texas and it gets HOT here, Something has blocked the Central Air from getting back to our Bedroom so I thought I would give this A.C. a try. Well today I decided to see what it would do in our living room where it had got up to 79 degrees, With in a hour it had dropped it down to 73 degrees and I actully got cold. LOVE IT and cant wait to get it hooked up in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Fonville

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cooling
customer_reviews.text: I truly like this portable air conditioner. We are using it in our shop. It cools nicely. It was extremely easy to set up. I like the remote control and being able to access all of the functions. I'm thinking about buying another one of these for our home.
customer_reviews.author: LauraM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These units performed well, low noise level and kept bedrooms at temperature when the central unit went down. We now use the three units for air circulation in fan mode throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Smith, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased! We had two of the Delongi (sp
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical about a unit that doesn't require a drain. I stepped out on faith and reviews and bought 2 for the tack rooms in our horse boarding barn. These are working so well, I'm very pleased! We had two of the Delongi (sp?) units and these are far superior. Both of the previous units leaked,
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this air conditioner! It has been unusually hot in San Diego and this has been a God sent. I have two for my condo, but the other one is a different brand and about every 4-6 hours, depending on the humidity, I need to empty the container that holds the water extracted from the air. It's a really problem during the night! However, this one you never need to empty and that is a real plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: SHARLEE

customer_reviews.title: Works very well to cool our home Gym
customer_reviews.text: Works very well to cool our home Gym! Our basement is very very warm, therefore we had to buy a portable AC to cool the gym room when we work out, This AC does the work and cools the room very well and very quickly from 80F to 68F in 10 minutes or so. The only downside I have for this is that it does not come with a tray you are supposed to put to drain the water, and it is also not sold seperately so you have to improvise and get something to drain the water. I complained about this and got a refund of $20 so I am happy overall that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I ordered on a Monday expecting it to arrive Thursday ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered on a Monday expecting it to arrive Thursday but surprisingly received it on Tuesday. That service alone would be 5+ stars as we were going through a heat wave and All portable air conditioners and nearly every fan were sold out at 4 stores nearby. The air conditioner itself is really loud at the low setting and I often cannot hear my alarm clock. However, it does the job and cools my room quickly and can get quite cold. The window piece is a bit flimsy but once installed, I haven't had any issues with it coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely loud. Impossible to sleep with this in bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to keep this machine. It looks great. It's very easy to assemble, and it cools down the room quickly. But honestly, it is my worst nightmare. It's so LOUD I cannot sleep with this thing running in my room. Every time the compressor kicks on, a lout grinding sound startles me from sleep. It doesn't have a sleep mode, and the timer doesn't work. I'm returning this item and buying a pedestal fan. Well, the return shipping cost more than the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw Lu

customer_reviews.title: 100% must buy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best air conditioners I’ve been around. My family each have a different stand up one and ours cools twice the amount of room Space in the shortest time I’m gunna buy another one for next summer for my room!
customer_reviews.author: bernard straight jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome there are no other words for this unit I bought for a room in my house that the our A/C does not reach enough and the room has no insulation but with this unit it works awesome I mean it gets cold had to lower i to 76 degrees and feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rob1

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bedroom this summer. It does cool the room to some degree but not as well as I'd hoped. The biggest frustration for me, however, is in how many times I've had to reattach the ventilation hose to the unit. It keeps popping out and filling the room with hot air. I've fixed that thing more times than I can count and if I hadn't been distracted by other issues after I bought it, I might have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Weir

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk! Item never cooled! Ran for 5 hours and and temp dropped 2 degrees!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I could have put ice in an ice chest and opened the lid and the room would have gotten colder than it did with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Of course you can't leave an AC upside down so that was pretty much that
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because Amazon once again proved it's return policy does work and it is safe to buy from them. I'm not sure who screwed this one up but the product arrived in a box with no marking and the bottom (what should have been the bottom) was detached from the box. FedEx then left the package upside down balanced precariously on a step. Of course you can't leave an AC upside down so that was pretty much that. I did turn it on but of course no cooling, whirring noise when I turned it off and a thin film of oil covering everything. Take home lesson, never buy an AC unit REFURBISHED.
customer_reviews.author: Jared B.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever. It did not fit vertically , the window bracket was broken in the package itself . We still thought to try as we did not want to get in the hassle of returning it and it was not even effective in a room of size of 12*14
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Thakur

customer_reviews.title: It works well, looks great and easy to move and set up
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product in a 600 square room. It pumps out cold air. Adjustable. Looks beautiful and sleek. Not a big tank-like appearance. Weighs 40 pounds or so, but very easy to move around on wheels. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Donald  Liponi, author of La Rumorosa Rock Art Along the Border Volume 1

customer_reviews.title: Be Ready to Turn Up Your TV Volume Control
customer_reviews.text: I have my Honeywell in the upstairs master bedroom. The unit does a good job of reducing the temperature by about 5-7 degrees. However I live in the NW and I have a very,very large bedroom with 9' ceilings. My only complaints are that the remote only works from about 10-12 feet away from unit. The second complaint is that its loud. It's much, much loader than an AC unit that you would have in your typical hotel room. When the AC unit is off, my TV volume is set at 11 or 12. When the AC unit is on, I turn my TV volume up to the fax volume setting (around 40).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Portable AC unit Honeywell
customer_reviews.text: Using unit in bedroom. We have Central AC but find the windows unit just keeps room a little cooler but can adjust easily with remote if to cold. Easy installation and pleased I invested in product this year
customer_reviews.author: Billie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever
customer_reviews.text: This unit is fantastic. I have a 1 bedroom apartment and Im thrilled with how well it cools my bedroom and when I pivot it to cool my living room it does that to. I love this u it. Noise level is seriously not bad. I had a dual exhaust Soleus and it was four times louder and I dont think it worked as well. People who complain about this unit are crazy.
customer_reviews.author: RKP

customer_reviews.title: Will not cool room unless it's about 100 square feet..B
customer_reviews.text: Blows cool air, never goes under 79 degrees...you have to sit directly in front of it to feel it....would like to return it. We are finding them on other sites for 100 to 150 dollars...what we paid for this is not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W.Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like anything about it. It wouldn't power on at all. And now I have to wait for a refund after my returning to Ups... smh.. product came leaking something. Oil I'm guessing. Raggedy box. Just no hope. I'm buying another brand and keeping my fingers crossed
customer_reviews.author: bamn

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job at cooling- using in our master bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job at cooling- using in our master bedroom, 250-300 sq ft. Quiet is a subjective term and everyone has their own definition and requirements. If you can sleep with heavy white noise you should be ok. The compressor whines slightly so it sounds like someone is outside a couple houses away using a weed whacker.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Loud, and now dead in 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it on Nov 25, 2015, now on December 29th, 2016 it is DEAD. It never worked all that great, very loud, and now dead! Total waste of money and time. Look for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amin Ash

customer_reviews.title: does the job well!!
customer_reviews.text: purchased this unit based on reviews and I am very happy. needed a unit for a bedroom and I like it cold as possible. this unit gets to around 60 degrees and does the job well. most air conditioners wont get any colder than that. it was an easy setup with no issues. it is not a silent unit,but what ac unit is.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great A/C Unit with AMAZING costumer service!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this almost a year ago and it is still working great. Cools our small bedroom in less than 5 minutes from 90F+ down to 64f. Only issues I had was the original unit showed up damaged but they replaced immediately. Just had a fan blade crack and start rattling, but again, once I reached out and described the problem they sent me a new unit right away.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, great value
customer_reviews.text: wonderful!!! I live near Seattle in an apt. I have severe seasonal allergies & have to keep my place closed up. It will cool down 4 degrees in about an hour. It's quieter than the one I had before. I have it in the living room. Every 3-4 hours I turn it on & watch movies or listen to music on my lap top while it cools down again. Before it arrived I had several days of severe hives from the heat. I have it in my slider. I used foam poster board to block the large area above the supplied window kit. I'm a 61 year old woman. It was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Teri J Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Is it an AC or an airplane turbine ??
customer_reviews.text: This model has a very old technology system. EXTREMELY NOISY. Looks like I have a turbine inside my bedroom. The supplied venting system has a very short hose with it that makes you having to buy an extra one and that will be about 50 USD with the needed coupling. Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: It's not the worst air conditioner but it definitely takes a while to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not the worst air conditioner but it definitely takes a while to cool down a medium size room. The noise level isnt that bad though and setup was a snap. Overall it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until the temperatures rose to over 100 degrees and ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until the temperatures rose to over 100 degrees and the plastic exhaust compartment attached to the window melted. One would think that this particular piece would be able to withstand heat, since it is an air conditioner. Now I can't use the air conditioner effectively without letting cool air escape through the warped pieces in the window.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: My little robot
customer_reviews.text: Honeywell seems to have some higher quality appliances, and this one fits the bill. Being from the PNW, AC is a new phenomenon for me. After moving to the Northeast, I thought I would get away on the cheap using fans, like we do in the PNW when it gets hot. But after suffering through the sweltering armpit that was New England's summer last year, I said hell no to another round of that and bought this little dynamo last Spring. The set up is easy and this puppy can crank. I noticed the change in temperature and my own mental well being immediately after turning this on. Don't worry about the price. It's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Unit
customer_reviews.text: Saved my bacon during a hot summer in third floor apartment. Have moved since and gave to my daughter for her second floor attic. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Adams

customer_reviews.title: Louder than expected
customer_reviews.text: Louder than expected and incredibly awkward to move. The exhaust hose is connected near the bottom on the unit and is so rigid that it makes it difficult to place the unit close to the window to save space. Troubling if you live in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: mountaingecko

customer_reviews.title: Great workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Great work for cooling a room. I have three of these in my old 1900’s era house, keeps it cool. They aren’t quiet, but also do more work than your typical window unit. 2 modest complaints: -the loud factor and sometimes some clicking after it’s been running -the exhaust hose is in an awful position for connecting to a window. Please design so the unit can fit flush next to a wall w the hose exiting vertically.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to unpack, set up!
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient at cooling room, easy to relocate with wheels on the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Talespinnerkitty

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The heat wave in San Diego didn't hit until it was too late to return this very disappointing air conditioner. It started at 80 degrees and even after 3 hours it could only cool our living room down to 78 degrees, with all the doors and windows closed. I do not recommend purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Beletsis, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: I love this but the tube comes out super easy so ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this but the tube comes out super easy so we had to duct tape it to the back of it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet D

customer_reviews.title: I had to come up with a better way to attach it to the window so that ...
customer_reviews.text: The reason I took one star away is due to the part used to connect to the window. I had to come up with a better way to attach it to the window so that it would not be easily removed from the outside. The air conditioner itself has been working very well with a high volume of air being circulated. I am using it for a room bigger than it is designed for and still it makes the room much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kuhaku

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Great for a small room. Worth every penny, very very strong air conditioning, plus an automatic dehumidifier if you live in a humid area.
customer_reviews.author: mollers

customer_reviews.title: It is working well for her but never gets as cool as the settings she has chosen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use in her non-air conditioned apartment. It is working well for her but never gets as cool as the settings she has chosen. I think she is trying to cool more space than the unit calls for. I thought she could move from room to room but the hose connection is a tad flimsy and not conducive to moving around so she just uses in in a bedroom. She/I would recommend to others. It's been a live-saver in our 90 degree weather and her cats are perfectly happy with the coolness of the bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design. Very good otherwise.  Quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Having no outside air intake means you are using your already cooled and dehumidifier inside air to remove heat and moisture from the ac itself then exhaust out window. This means also you are causing more outside hot humid air to enter you house. The efficiency rating on the device does not take this into account. It probably uses close to twice the energy to cool the same as a typical in window unit.
customer_reviews.author: tech guy dm

customer_reviews.title: Cools the room
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this Air Conditioner. I have always gotten the window ones till last year when I was in a room that couldn't have a window one. I borrowed a similar model to this and loved it. So far this Honeywell model is working as advertised. It is cooling the room. Not any noisier than the Fan I have been using. Also enjoyed that it showed up 2 days earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: EmEe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Got 3 good summers out of it. Last summer it wasn’t cooling my bedroom well. So now expecting it to not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Mia X

product_meta.title: Honeywell MN10CESWW Environmental Appliance, Rooms Up To 350-450 Sq. Ft, White
product_meta.description: Size:Room up to 450 Sq. FtThe Honeywell MN Series portable air conditioner has a sleek, modern design cooling and dehumidifying areas 300-450 square feet. With 3-in-1 technology, this portable air conditioner delivers optimum cooling and dehumidification. It also has a fan-only function. The full-function remote control allows you to operate each feature from across the room. Unlike a fixed AC, this unit requires no permanent installation and four caster wheels provide easy mobility between areas. Plus, the auto-evaporation system allows for hours of continuous operation with no water to drain or no bucket to empty. This MN10CESWW comes with everything needed including a flexible exhaust hose and an easy-to-install window venting kit. The window vent can be removed when the unit is not in use.cfm174cooling power:10000.
feature_bullets: Powerful, safe & dependable Cools rooms up to 350-450 sq. ft. Thermal Overload protection for added safety & peace of mind.
Quick installation easy-to-install window venting kit included with adjustable window bracket from 19.9". to 47.25"
Easy maintenance Washable Filter designed to protect from dust & hair to extend product life & performance. Filter cleans easily under a faucet for easy maintenance.
Designed for comfort Enjoy simple digital control with 3 fan speeds, 24 hour energy saving timer & remote control included

3-in-1 appliance Powerful cooling in the summer, Dehumidifier for humid days (removes up to 66 pints/ 24 hours with continuous drain option for long unattended operation), Fan circulates air for everyday comfort. Exhaust Hose Length: 12" to 47".
Cooling capacity 10000 BTU (ASHRAE-128 Standard) / 5500 BTU (DOE+ 2017 Standard)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars2,189 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Limited 1-year parts and labor for unit and 18-months parts for compressor.
